summary: A taxi receipt from the Curb service for a fare in New York, totaling $73.70. The document is a financial record showing transportation expenses, likely part of a larger collection of financial documents related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Suraju

events.title: Taxi trip in New York
events.description: A taxi trip was taken in New York, serviced by driver Suraju, with a total fare of $73.70.

keyFacts: The document is a taxi receipt from the Curb service for a trip within New York.
The total fare was $73.70, including a $52.00 base fare, various surcharges, and a $12.28 tip.
The driver for the trip was named Suraju, operating vehicle #8E22.
The trip occurred on November 15, though the year is not specified in the provided text.
This appears to be a routine financial/expense record, potentially part of a larger audit or collection of travel documents.
